column4: Did anyone have problems installing ubuntu 8.04 on windows ME?
I think I need some context for that question before my brain hemmorages.
Oh, okay.  So you're trying to replace Windows ME with Ubuntu, yes?
I don't know of any good virtualization software that will run properly under Windows ME.  (For that part, I don't know very much software that will run properly in Windows ME.)  What were you using?
